description: This file defines a React component called Catalog that displays a list of books with client-side filtering based on search query and category. It manages URL parameters to pre-filter results and provides UI elements for search input and category selection. It uses hooks like useState, useEffect, and useMemo for state and memoization, and references external components ProductList and Filters, as well as sampleBooks data.

methods.name: clearSearch
methods.description: Clears the search query and updates the URL to remove query parameters.
